member.name: T:Dotmim.Sync.ApplyChangesConflictOccuredArgs
member.summary: Raised as an argument when an apply is failing. Waiting from user for the conflict resolution.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ApplyChangesConflictOccuredArgs.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or Sets the action to be taken when resolving the conflict. If you choose MergeRow, FinalRow will be merged in both sources.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ApplyChangesConflictOccuredArgs.ProgressLevel
member.summary: Gets the Progress level used to determine if message is output.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ApplyChangesConflictOccuredArgs.SenderScopeId
member.summary: Gets or Sets the scope id who will be marked as winner.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ApplyChangesConflictOccuredArgs.FinalRow
member.summary: Gets or sets if we have a merge action, the final row represents the merged row.

member.name: M:Dotmim.Sync.ApplyChangesConflictOccuredArgs.GetSyncConflictAsync
member.summary: Get the conflict that occurs by selecting the local conflict row.

member.name: T:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupArgs
member.summary: Event args raised when a conflicting setup between server and one client is occuring.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupArgs.Action
member.summary: Gets or sets an action enumeration value for the action to handle the Conflicting Setups.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupArgs.Setup
member.summary: Gets or sets the Setup provided from the SynchronizeAsync() method. May be null.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupArgs.ClientScopeInfo
member.summary: Gets or Sets the client scope info used to check if the client is conflicting.

member.name: P:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupArgs.ServerScopeInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the server scope info to check if client is conflicting.

member.name: T:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupAction
member.summary: When a conflict is happening, you can choose to continue, abort or rollback the sync process.

member.name: F:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupAction.Abort
member.summary: Abort the sync without raising any Error.

member.name: F:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupAction.Continue
member.summary: Continue the sync process. ClientScopeInfo.Setup / Schema and ServerScopeInfo.Setup / Schema must be equals.

member.name: F:Dotmim.Sync.ConflictingSetupAction.Rollback
member.summary: Rollback the sync, raising an error.

member.name: F:Dotmim.Sync.Enumerations.ErrorResolution.ContinueOnError
member.summary:
Ignore the error and continue to sync. Error will be stored locally in a separate batch info file.
Row is stored locally with a state of or depending on the row state.

member.name: F:Dotmim.Sync.Enumerations.ErrorResolution.RetryOneMoreTimeAndThrowOnError
member.summary:
Will try one more time once after all the others rows in the table.
If the error is raised again, an exception is thrown and transaction is rollback.

member.name: F:Dotmim.Sync.Enumerations.ErrorResolution.RetryOneMoreTimeAndContinueOnError
member.summary:
Will try one more time once after all the others rows in the table.
If the error is raised again, Sync continues normally and error will be stored locally in a separate batch info file with a state of or depending on the row state.

member.name: F:Dotmim.Sync.Enumerations.ErrorResolution.RetryOnNextSync
member.summary: Row is stored locally and will be applied again on next sync. Sync continues normally and row is stored locally with a state of or depending on the row state.

member.summary: Considers the row as applied.

Contains methods to handle conflicts.

Contains the logic to get the last timestamp from the orchestrator database.
Contains internal methods to create, drop, check stored procedures.
Contains internals methods to manage tables.
Contains internals methods to create tracking tables.
Contains internal methods to create triggers.
Contains internal methods to get command from provider, check connection is opened, affect connection and transaction.
Contains internals methods to set commands parameters.
Contains the logic to get changes.
Contains internals methods to clear metadatas.
Contains internal provisioning methods.
Contains the logic to handle client scope info.
Contains the logic to handle client scope info.
Contains the logic to handle scopes tables.
Contains the logic to upgrade the database schema to the last version.

member.name: T:Dotmim.Sync.LocalOrchestrator
member.summary: Contains methods to apply changes on the local provider.
Contains the logic to get changes from the local datasource.

summary.para: The LocalOrchestrator object allows you to interact with the local datsource, (using a sync provider to access it).
Use a LocalOrchestrator object only when you want to interact with a client datasource. If you want to interact with your server datasource, consider using a RemoteOrchestrator instead.

member.summary: Contains the logic to update all the rows that are not tracked on the client side.
Contains methods to clear metadatas on the local provider.
Contains all methods related to provisioning a local database.
Contains the logic to handle client scope info.
Contains methods to get a scope info from the remote data source. A scope contains the setup and the schema.
Contains the logic to handle errors during the sync process.
Apply changes locally.
Apply a snapshot locally.

optional cancellation token.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates a filterclause allowing to specify a different DbType. If you specify the columnType, Dotmim.Sync will expect that the column does not exist on the table, and the filter is only used as a parameter for the selectchanges stored procedure. Thus, IsVirtual would be true.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates a filterclause allowing to specify a different DbType. If you specify the columnType, Dotmim.Sync will expect that the column does not exist on the table, and the filter is only used as a parameter for the selectchanges stored procedure. Thus, IsVirtual would be true.
